description: Application-focused handoff configuration for Lovable emphasizing user flows and complete app functionality

strategy.focus: Feature flows + user stories + overall application concept
strategy.approach: Functional layer analysis, focusing on user journeys and business logic

prompt_templates.base_template: Build a ${app_category} application that allows ${user_roles} to ${core_features}, user flow: ${user_journey_steps}, main features include ${feature_list}, supporting ${integrations} integrations

enterprise_saas.prompt:
Build an enterprise data analytics application that allows administrators to monitor business metrics and team performance.

User Flow:
1. Login to access dashboard homepage
2. View key metrics overview (user growth, revenue changes, conversion funnel)
3. Click specific metrics to view detailed reports
4. Set up data alerts and scheduled reports
5. Manage team permissions and data access scope

Main Features:
- Real-time data dashboard displaying KPI metric cards
- Interactive charts with time range selection and data drill-down
- Custom report generation and export
- Team collaboration and data sharing
- Mobile responsive design for data access anytime

ecommerce_platform.prompt:
Build an e-commerce product browsing application that allows users to:
- Browse product grid, view images, prices, ratings
- Click products to view detail pages
- Add items to cart with quantity selection
- Filter products by price, category, rating
- Save favorite items to wishlist
- Compare similar products' specifications and prices
Supports responsive design, mobile switches to single column layout

social_platform.prompt:
Build a social media platform where users can:

Content Creation Flow:
1. Register/login, complete personal profile
2. Publish text, images, video content
3. Add tags and location information
4. Set content visibility (public/private/friends)

Social Interactions:
- Follow other users, view activity feed
- Like, comment, share content
- Direct messaging with text and media support
- Create and join interest groups
- Real-time notification system

Discovery Features:
- Recommendation algorithm showing relevant content
- Trending topics and hashtags
- Nearby people and events
- Search users and content
